trans-unit.source: This online store sells T-shirts, and you able to navigate through their categories using this menu.
We found the problem, the website may be working unexpectedly
We cannot load detailed info about this product, please, try again or later

You may get acquainted with the product. They all are T-shirts, but the images on them are different (this is a T-shirt prints online store). Find the one interested to you, and then add it to your cart or open the details page to learn more about this product.
We sell the most inspiration ideas
We encountered problems while loading catalog Press the button below to try to load this catalog again
Welcome to the new magnificent demo for Turing.ly! It developed with Angular selected as the framework and Google Material as UI Kit.
This application is not a real product, it is just a live demo of an online store in order to demonstrate the candidate's technical skills.
Every department or category has an interface to navigate over store/categories contents and select your interested products.
This online store was completed in July 2019 by Roman Yakimchuk (yakimchuk.ry@gmail.com). Thanks for coming to our online store J
Something goes wrong, we cannot find shipping areas
Where do you want to receive your order?
Something goes wrong, we cannot find shipping variants to the selected area
How do you want to receive your order?
If you do not see your area or suitable shipping option, please contact us at shipping@turing-demo.world
You have been successfully singed in
We cannot authorize you at this time, please try again or later
Such combination of email and password is not found, please check entered data
We cannot register you at this time, please try again or later
This email is already in use, please use other one or sign in using the left form
You have entered incorrect email (incorrect characters)
Please select suitable taxation for your order
How you'd like to receive your order?
We have experienced issues at try to allow you to pay your order. However, we will try to display you all of your orders.
We cannot find any of your unpaid orders. You can open your account and try to find and pay your order manually. Anyway, please write to us to support@turing-demo.world.

We found the only one unpaid order, if it is your just confirmed order, you can pay it now. Otherwise please open your account and pay your order, or write to us to support@turing-demo.world to get qualified support.
We have found many unpaid orders and cannot determine which of them is your just confirmed order. Please, open your account page, then find your order and pay it.
We have successfully received your order #. At any time you can manage your orders and account in the account area.
We cannot find just paid order, but it seems everything fine and you paid your order. We will try to show you all of your orders so you can check payment result yourself.

We cannot find any of your orders. It seems like you opened this pages accidentally. If you not, then please check your orders manually in your account and write to us to support@turing-demo.world, we will help you.
Thank you for using our online store!
We have successfully received your order and payment. You may track your orders (and know when it was shipped to you) in your account (section "OrdersService").
Cannot clear your cart at this time. Try do remove items one by one, or try later
Your cart has been successfully cleaned
Sign in or register in order to continue creation of your order
Order was not confirmed due to canceled authorization
We cannot register your order at this time, please, try again or later
We have registered your order, but we cannot download its data, please, reload the page and open your account
We have registered your order, but we faced some technical errors, please, reload the page and open your account
You have successfully paid your order
We faced some issues at your try to pay your order, please, try again or later
Your personal data (orders and information management)
Your session has expired, sign in again, please
You must sign in in order manage your account
You have successfully logged out from the account
Cannot log you out at this time, please try again or later
We encountered problems while loading catalog Press the button below to try to load this catalog again
We encountered problems while loading catalog Press the button below to try to load this catalog again
We cannot load this offer, please reload the page or open it later
* The real T-shirt may differ from this image. It is just a sample of the image on T-shirt.

If you are looking for something in particular, you may also use the global search over the whole T-shirts variants. This search is predictive so you may access every product from any page of the application.

When you will select all you need, you may open your cart and proceed to the checkout process and pay order. The most interesting part is an exception handling. Just try to break this checkout process.
We cannot load departments list Please, press the button to try again
Could not load an image You can try load this image again by pressing the button below
We could not load data to calculate total price
Something goes wrong, we cannot find taxes for your order
The product quantity has been updated
We unable to update the product quantity at this time
The product has been removed from your cart
We unable to remove product from your cart at this time
We cannot show you information about the order at this time. Please, reopen this page or try later
For some reasons we cannot load list with your ordered items, but do not worry, we know your order contents
Your order has been successfully paid! Await for delivery, please. Shipping date will be available above.
Your order is in unknown status. Please send us a message to the email support@turing-demo.world.
Your order has been successfully paid
We faced issues at try to process your order
You have paid your order, but we cannot reload it to show you its new status, please, reload the page manually
At this moment you did not order anything... Begin shopping?
You can enter number in any format with leading plus
You can enter only plus, brackets, numbers and hyphen
